programme.title: Kandahar
programme.desc: A CIA operative and his translator flee from special forces in Afghanistan after exposing a covert mission.

programme.title: The Pledge
programme.desc: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: A ailed assassination attempt of U.S. President leads to disaster.

programme.title: Killer Elite
programme.desc: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for his son's deaths.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: A rancher on the Arizona border becomes the unlikely defender of a young Mexican boy desperately fleeing the cartel assassins who've pursued him into the U.S.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship.

programme.title: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
programme.desc: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife barreling towards a shattering climax.
